Text:
Please help me seed this. I know I've been looking for it for a long time.

Thank You Ricky.

i hate to be asking for stuff, but can anyone upload the song burn this town by battleme?  it was in the beginning of the season 2 finale of SOA.  thank you so much if anyone does upload it.  and thanks ricky for this torrent.

thank you for this upload. Its the only one on TPB of it's kind. I wish there was more. There are a few songs I heard in season 2 that I would love to have but can't figure it out. I guess it's back to the grind. THANK YOU THOUGH
i just love the music from soa, so i wonder are there more? 5 songes just isent enough :)
I promise to seed this for 2 weeks! ^_^
im curious if anyone has the second soundtrack from the show.  its called "shelter"
If anyone is interested, both of the official EP,s [North Country & Shelter] can be found in iTunes for $4.95 each
